isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - WHEELS, RIMS AND TIRES - TIRE CARE - ALIGNMENT - REAR AXLE

svcproc.title: ALIGNMENT - REAR AXLE
svcproc.para: In recent years, the importance of drive-axle alignment has become increasingly evident. Tandem-drive axles that are not parallel to each other or axles that are not perpendicular to the chassis centerline have a definite effect on steer-tire wear. For rear axle alignment information, refer to GROUP 14 - REAR AXLES in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual.
